title: Nordic Technology-Enhanced Collaborative Inquiry Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Language domain education program for professionals, emphasizing collaborative problem-solving competencies in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners will be able to design two or more collaborative inquiry learning scenarios using TEL tools
Participants will complete at least 80% of practical assignments linking digital literacy with educational space design
Learners will iteratively improve educational tool designs at least three times based on peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
